page.title: 06RECREATION AROUND BYWELL
page.content: Near Bywell school are 7 political social clubs and Dewsbury Rugby League Club.Hanging Heaton boasts a tennis club,cricket club and golf course.The local park at Earlsheaton consists of playing areas,gardens and facilities for tennis and bowls.There is fishing and a recreation area in Gawthorpe.A random survey of leisure activities was taken of 35 local families. Personal recreation included a high percentge of television or video viewing and computer games.Popular among the adults was gardening, reading,music,walking,DIY and sewing while one family bred parrots.The children supported uniformed organisations and sporting activities. The local church and chapel provided extra entertainment.Other activities such as cinema, theatre and swimming meant travelling into the town centre.
